refnamediv.refpurpose: Sends a krate signal out from an instrument to a named port.

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: Sends a krate signal out from an instrument to a named port.

refsect1.title: Initialization
refsect1.para: Sname -- String name of the outlet port. The name of the outlet is implicitly qualified by the instrument name or number, so it is valid to use the same outlet name in more than one instrument (but not to use the same outlet name twice in one instrument).

refsect1.title: Performance
refsect1.para: During performance, the krate output signal is sent to each instance of an instrument containing an inlet port to which this outlet has been connected using the connect opcode. The signals of all the outlets connected to an inlet are summed in the inlet.

refsect1.title: Examples
refsect1.para:
Here is an example of the outletk opcode. It uses the file outletk.csd.
Example of the outletk opcode.
See the sections Real-time Audio and Command Line Flags for more information on using command line flags.

refsect1.title: See Also
refsect1.para: More information on this opcode: http://www.csoundjournal.com/issue13/signalFlowGraphOpcodes.html , written by Michael Gogins
